title: Antasecure
definition: Capacity to hold both a strong sense of security about oneself and an unshakable insecurity in social settings.
examples:
• Did you see Theodore's speech? His voice was trembling, that was embarrassing.
  • Oh you didn't know? He's antasecure.

title: Candidcrush
definition: A brief, intense and irrational enamouring of a person whose incompatibility is obvious. A candidcrush is unconsciously sought and maintained as a way to revive long-forgotten feelings. Often happens in summer.
examples:
• Andrew is getting really close to Carrie. Doesn't he have a partner?
  • Meh no big deal, this looks to me like a candidcrush.

title: Vertigandal
definition: Fear of making an utterly embarrassing statement while not thinking it e.g. suddenly saying I love you to someone you hate, or making a blatantly racist comment to a person of colour. Vertigandal is similar to one's fear of jumping from a building despite the fact that this is the latest of her intentions.

title: Scizoops
definition: The willingness one has to be liked by someone she dislikes. In its most acute variant, the willingness increases exponentially with the intensity of dislike.
